EXPERIENCE

CGI group | FullStack Developer

Fall 2018
Tools: Java, Intellij, Spring, Docker, Kubernetes, ElasticSearch, git, Jenkins, Mockito
  • Constructed a kubernetes microservice app based on an existing monolithic Java Spring app.
  • Reduce servcie heap usage from 512mb down to 256mb by manually handling SQL connections, reducing caching size, and reducing thread stack at JVM side.
  • Routed services connections with TCP, and perform service lookup using a nameserver to an instance of target service, rather than to a physical ip addresses.
  • Integrated Istio for traffic managemenet, load balancing, and horizontal pod scaling.
  • Uses Sleuth for distributed tracing and ElasticSearch for centralized logging.

Blackberry | Android Developer

Fall 2017
Tools: Java, Intellij, Android, Angular, WebRTC, ICal, CalDav, Gerrit
  • Discovered a bottleneck problem at calendar row adapter, thereby added a layer of abstraction to calender row object making it providers (Google, Exchange, Yahoo, etc) agnostic.
  • Replaced repetitive HTTP requests with WebRTC to stream data across devices.
  • Implemented asynchronous loading for account settings(legacy issue), then used presenter to send data to view in a MVP architecture.
  • Researched and complied parts of Material-UI library into BlackBerry Calendar.

RBC Royal Bank | Cloud Developer Winter 2017

Tools: ElasticSearch, Ruby, java, Logging, Google Map API, MaxMind GeoIP
  • Scripted an ElasticSearch pipeline to look up queries' origin IP and assign Geo Coordinates.
  • Interface the data pipelines with Dynatrace and Bluemix to collect data to ElasticSearch.
  • Configured Kibana project to produce visualized report from ElasticSearch data.
PROJECTS

Hachy — Candle Egg with Machine Learning Summer 2018

Microsoft Image Cup World Finalist, 3rd place in Canada
  • Built an android app to scan the eggs and return development status.
  • Conducted labs to develop a methodology to identify features in egg development.
  • Trained a tensorflow image classifier with 2000 images of eggs obtained in labs to classify eggs into early, middle and late stages.
  • Engineered Rest API for the NodeJS backend hosted on Azure using continous delivery.
